{{Infobox person | name = Hero Fiennes-Tiffin | image = | caption = | birth_name = {{nowrap|Hero Beauregard Fiennes-Tiffin}} | birth_date = {{birth date and age|df=y|1997|11|6|}} | birth_place = [[London]], [[England]], [[United Kingdom]] | death_date = | death_place = | othername = | occupation = Actor | yearsactive = 2008-present | spouse = | domesticpartner = | website = }} '''Hero Beauregard Fiennes-Tiffin'''<ref name=peerage>[http://www.thepeerage.com/p33643.htm#i336429 thePeerage.com]</ref> (born 6 November 1997)<ref name=peerage/> is an English actor best known for his role as the 11-year-old [[Lord Voldemort|Tom Riddle]], the young version of [[antagonist]] [[Lord Voldemort]], in the sixth installment of [[Harry Potter]] [[Harry Potter (film series)|films]], ''[[Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince (film)|Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince]]'', released on 15 July 2009 in the United States and the United Kingdom.<ref name="PR Newswire">[http://www.prnewswire.co.uk/cgi/news/release?id=213122 "Casting Is Complete on 'Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince.'"] Distributed by ''[[PR Newswire]]'' on behalf of [[Warner Bros.|Warner Bros. Pictures]], 16 November 2007. Retrieved 2008-08-19.</ref>
==Family==
Fiennes-Tiffin is the son of film directors [[George Tiffin]] and [[Martha Fiennes]]. His sister and brother are Mercy (who played Little Georgiana in [[The Duchess (film)|The Duchess]]) and Titan Fiennes-Tiffin,<ref>Bryne, Paul. [http://www.movies.ie/html/article.aspx?articleid=3047 "Interview: Ralph Fiennes."] ''[http://www.movies.ie Movies.ie,]'', 9 February 2008. Retrieved on 2008-09-03.</ref> while his uncles are actors [[Ralph Fiennes]], who has played the adult Lord Voldemort since the [[Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire (film)|fourth film]], and [[Joseph Fiennes]].<ref name="USA Today Trailer">Puig, Claudia. [http://www.usatoday.com/life/movies/news/2008-07-28-potter-trailer_N.htm "'Potter' trailer unveils a young Voldemort."] ''[[USA Today]]'', Life section, 30 July 2008. Retrieved 2008-08-19.</ref>
==Career== Fiennes-Tiffin made his first film appearance as Spartak in the 2008 [[drama film|drama]], ''[[Bigga Than Ben]]''.<ref name="IMDb">[http://www.imdb.com/name/nm2842005/ "Hero Fiennes-Tiffin."] [[Internet Movie Database]]. Retrieved 2008-08-19.</ref> Fiennes-Tiffin earned the part of young Voldemort even though thousands of young actors auditioned for the role;<ref name="Times Casting" /> at least one publication, however, has alleged his family relation alone landed him the part.<ref name="NYMag">[http://nymag.com/daily/entertainment/2008/07/jennifer_lopez_lands_a_job_as.html "Jennifer Lopez Elected âGoverness.'"] ''[[New York (magazine)|New York]]'', 29 July 2008. Retrieved on 2008-08-21.</ref> [[David Yates]], director of ''Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince'', said Fiennes-Tiffin was cast as Tom Riddle due to his ability to find "the darker space" in his line readings.<ref name="EW Fall Preview">Jensen, Jeff. "There Will Be 'Half-Blood.'". ''[[Entertainment Weekly]]'', Iss. #1007/1008, August 22/29, 2008. pg. 39. Retrieved on 2008-08-19.</ref> Yates said he did not get the role due to his relation to Ralph Fiennes, but admitted the family resemblance was "a clincher".<ref name="EW Fall Preview" /> Yates described the actor as "very focused and disciplined"<ref name="USA Today Trailer" /> and said he "got the corners and dark moods and odd spirit of the character"<ref name="Times Casting">Alberge, Dalya. "Voldemort's nephew has the villainous blood for film role." ''[[The Times]]'', 17 November 2007. Retrieved on 2008-08-19.</ref> and had a "wonderful haunted quality that seemed to bring Tom Riddle alive on-screen for us."<ref name="USA Today Trailer" />
==Living== He lives in south London with his mother and siblings.
==School== Hero currently attends Emanuel school in Battersea, London. He is in the class 9JOL.
On 1/12/11 he passed all his Christmas exams (R.S, Chemistry, Calculator maths and English). --[[Special:Contributions/86.182.161.115|86.182.161.115]] ([[User talk:86.182.161.115|talk]]) 17:26, 1 December 2011 (UTC)
